channel.title: Autospawn and npchandler error when running server
channel.description:
Sorry to be a pain but just getting back in to rsps and have forgot everything
well im going add godwars iv added models to the folder and add int's to class5 and when i add one to my autospawn and run my server i get the error below also i did add models for all the models i added to the folder
sooo i got this error >
exception in thread "main" java.arrayindexoutofboundsException: 8001 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:2512) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2278) at NPCHandler.(int)(NPCHandler.java:28) at server.main(server.java:154)
(NPCHandler.java:2512) = newNPC.walkingtype = walkingType; (NPCHandler.java:2278) = token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t"); (NPCHandler.java:28) = loadautospwn("../../config/autospawn.cfg");
my auto spawn line looks like this
spawn = 8001 2507 4718 0 0 0 0 0 1
anyone know how to get this to work?
Thanks rob

item.title: Autospawn and npchandler error when running server
item.dc:creator: @mr_eak mr eak
item.description:
@mr_eak wrote:

Sorry to be a pain but just getting back in to rsps and have forgot everything

well im going add godwars iv added models to the folder and add int’s to class5 and when i add one to my autospawn and run my server i get the error below also i did add models for all the models i added to the folder

sooo i got this error >

exception in thread “main” java.arrayindexoutofboundsException: 8001
at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:2512)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2278)
at NPCHandler.(int)(NPCHandler.java:28)
at server.main(server.java:154)

(NPCHandler.java:2512) = newNPC.walkingtype = walkingType;
(NPCHandler.java:2278) = token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
(NPCHandler.java:28) = loadautospwn("…/…/config/autospawn.cfg");

my auto spawn line looks like this

spawn = 8001 2507 4718 0 0 0 0 0 1

anyone know how to get this to work?

Thanks rob

Read full topic
